Address.label: Address
Address.value: 50 KATHERINE STREET,SASOL PLACE, SANDTON, JOHANNESBURG, 2196, South Africa

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sasol Ltd operates as a vertically integrated chemicals and energy company through its three main segments: mining and gas; fuels and chemicals. It generates maximum revenue from the Chemicals segment. The company operates coal mines and its upstream interests in oil and gas, both of which are used as feedstock in the company's energy and chemicals operations. Sasol markets commodity and performance chemicals, sells liquid fuel products, and markets, distributes and transports pipeline gas.
